    • Constructor Detail

      • TGAReader

        public TGAReader​(java.io.InputStream in)
        Creates a TGAReader and saves its argument, the input stream in, for later use. An internal buffer array is created and stored in buf.
        Parameters:
        in - the underlying input stream.
